content:
Play after an attack or effect causes you to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed] or knocks you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Prone].

You roll backward from the attack, landing on your feet. Take a Step away from the source of the attack (if any), and you're no longer prone or grabbed.
name: Roll Back
